required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase I Study of SHR1459 in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Open-Label, Single-Center, Single-arm, Fixed Sequence Study on the Effect of Itraconazole on the Pharmacokinetics of SHR1459 in Health Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: Following a 10-hour overnight fast, subjects will be administered one dose of SHR1459 orally with 240 mL of ambient temperature water on Day 1. D2-D3 was the cleaning period. Itraconazole will be administered orally 200 mg/time/day form D4 to D8 after meal. On D7 following a 10-hour overnight fast, subjects will be administered SHR1459 and itraconazole 200 mg with 240 mL of ambient temperature water.

primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) of SHR1459

secondary_outcome.description: Time of maximum observed concentration (Tmax) of SHR1459
Apparent volume of distribution of SHR1459

arm_group.description: Following a 10-hour overnight fast, subjects will be administered one dose of SHR1459 orally with 240 mL of ambient temperature water on Day 1. D2-D3 was the cleaning period. Itraconazole will be administered orally 200 mg/time/day form D4 to D8 after meal. On D7 following a 10-hour overnight fast, subjects will be administered SHR1459 and itraconazole 200 mg with 240 mL of ambient temperature water.

intervention.description: SHR1459 will be administered on Day 1 and Day 7. Itraconazole will be administered on Day 4 to Day 8
